title: Verify: Modular context injection works end-to-end
description: Verify that the modular context system works correctly when Ralph spawns Claude instances. Test that contexts are loaded, merged correctly, and cleaned up.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Run Ralph with verbose mode to see context file path
Verify base.md content appears in Claude's context
Verify project-specific tech context is detected and loaded
Verify workflow/ralph.md content appears in context
Verify old injection (brave_skill, ralph_agent_instructions) is removed
Verify RALPH GIT RULES appears in loaded context (from workflow/ralph.md)
Verify temp context file is cleaned up after iteration
Test with different story types (US, BUG, V) to ensure contexts load
